articles.title: Stephen A. Smith claps back, calls Drake Maye a ‘liar’ over Cam Newton comments
articles.description:

articles.title: Connor Wong and Boston Red Sox agree to 1-year deal for $1,375,000
articles.description:
Obtained from the Los Angeles Dodgers, Wong has a .245 career average with 23 homers and 103 RBIs in 348 games over five major league seasons.
